description: This file contains implementation of a command execution utility in C, specifically the function os_cmd_exec_xv and related functions, which execute shell commands, capture output, and handle exit codes with logging.

methods.name: bool os_cmd_exec_xv(char ** buffer,int * len,int * exit_code,int flags,char * fmt,va_list args)
methods.description: Executes a shell command with formatted input, captures output, logs, and manages exit codes based on flags.

methods.name: bool os_cmd_exec_x(char ** buffer,int * len,int * exit_code,int flags,char * fmt,...)
methods.description: Wrapper around os_cmd_exec_xv that handles variable argument list for command execution.

methods.name: bool os_cmd_exec(char ** buffer,char * fmt,...)
methods.description: Simplified function for executing shell commands with one format string and capturing output.

ctags.name: os_cmd_exec_x
ctags.pattern: /^bool os_cmd_exec_x(char **buffer, int *len, int *exit_code, int flags, char *fmt, ...)$/

ctags.name: os_cmd_exec_xv
ctags.pattern: /^bool os_cmd_exec_xv(char **buffer, int *len, int *exit_code, int flags, char *fmt, va_list args)$/
ctags.signature: (char ** buffer,int * len,int * exit_code,int flags,char * fmt,va_list args)
